titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of vvithin the dioces of London, in the second trienniall visitation of the right honorable, and right reuerend father in God, William Lord Bishop of London. holden in the yeere of our lord God, 1631.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of London. Bishop (1628-1633 : Laud)
Laud, William, 1573-1645.

notesStmt.note: Name of printer from STC (2nd ed.).
Printers' device on t.p. (McK. 270); headpiece, initials.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
